results.title: PIL filed in Delhi HC seeking ban on Paresh Rawal’s The Taj Story
keywords: the taj story, paresh rawal, the taj story controvesy, taj mahal, taj mahal controversy,
creator: Gayatri Rani
results.description: A BJP leader from Ayodhya has filed a PIL in the Delhi High Court seeking a ban on Paresh Rawal’s The Taj Story. He claims the film misuses his petition on the Taj Mahal and could impact social and religious sentiments.

results.title: Business News | Piyush Goyal Meets with European Commissioner for Trade and Economic Security, Discusses India-EU FTA
creator: ANI
results.description: Get latest articles and stories on Business at LatestLY. Union Minister of Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal visited Brussels from 26-28 October 2025 and had productive and meaningful engagements with Maros Sefcovic, European Commissioner for Trade and Economic Security and his team on outstanding issues related to the ongoing India-EU FTA negotiations, as per a press release by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry.

results.title: Ayushmann Khurrana hits fifth century with ‘Thamma’
creator: TOI Entertainment Desk
results.description: Ayushmann Khurrana adds another feather to his cap with 'Thamma', marking his fifth film to cross the ₹100 crore mark after 'Dream Girl 2'. This Diwali release has already garnered ₹101.10 crore, and with a lull in major film releases until November, experts speculate 'Thamma' could surpass ₹115-₹125 crore, enhancing Khurrana's reputation as a leading figure in the cinematic landscape.

results.title: Katy Perry-Justin Trudeau: Former Canadian PM is 'crazy' about pop icon - Report
creator: TOI Entertainment Desk
results.description: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau is reportedly smitten with singer Katy Perry, with sources revealing a strong connection and shared views on various topics. The high-profile couple's romance went viral after they were spotted together, later confirming their relationship in Paris. This development echoes his father's history of dating famous women.
